# ARFrame.SegmentationClass.person

**Case**

A classification of a pixel in the segmentation buffer as part of a person.

## Declaration

```swift
case person
```

## Classifying Pixels

- **ARFrame.SegmentationClass.none**: A classification of a pixel in the segmentation buffer as unidentified.
